channel.title: C'mon! Is there a single NORMAL 508+ Server + Client? :|
channel.description:
Hello
I've been watching and learning and reading and downloading like crazy and all for nothing!
All I want is a HD 508 Source with a client that CAN run it. Apparently John's HD 508 phails to run anything else I've tried (like 10 servers) BUT Rubik's (which's interneface is "slightly" screwed").
So here's all I want:
A 508 Source HD GWD Barrows Maybe a good looking client and you know some fancy stuff. AND an ::item or ::pickup or something like that command to pick up some stuff that you don't find so often anyway -.-.... *cough* Rubik's Scape *cough*
Truth is there ARE some pretty impressive things out there BUT apparently I've failed to get them work. Either it's some cache related problem or the client JUST wont log into the server just like that.
Apparently every single one of the clients provided WITH the sources have been somewhat at a working state -.-
Does anyone run a 508 server in HD mode (I don't want all the fullscreen stuff and whatnot) with good enough GWD and drops? I mean c'mon! It's ridiculous what you have to do to get a working client for god's sakes.
And I don't get the whole idea about clients being closed source I mean what's all that about?
I hope I will see some offers here (I only wants Sources and Clients so don't come babbling about your server that's running).
Thank you Iceman

item.title: C'mon! Is there a single NORMAL 508+ Server + Client? :|
item.dc:creator: @icemansnowman icemansnowman
item.description:
@icemansnowman wrote:

da pimp:

lol? 508’s are new there arent many that good, so your better off usin a 317 for now

317’s s**k

Read full topic

@icemansnowman wrote:

Hello

I’ve been watching and learning and reading and downloading like crazy and all for nothing!

All I want is a HD 508 Source with a client that CAN run it. Apparently John’s HD 508 phails to run anything else I’ve tried (like 10 servers) BUT Rubik’s (which’s interneface is “slightly” screwed").

So here’s all I want:

HD
GWD
Barrows
Maybe a good looking client and you know some fancy stuff.
AND an ::item or ::pickup or something like that command to pick up some stuff that you don’t find so often anyway -.-… cough Rubik’s Scape cough

Truth is there ARE some pretty impressive things out there BUT apparently I’ve failed to get them work. Either it’s some cache related problem or the client JUST wont log into the server just like that.

Apparently every single one of the clients provided WITH the sources have been somewhat at a working state -.-

Does anyone run a 508 server in HD mode (I don’t want all the fullscreen stuff and whatnot) with good enough GWD and drops? I mean c’mon! It’s ridiculous what you have to do to get a working client for god’s sakes.

And I don’t get the whole idea about clients being closed source I mean what’s all that about?

I hope I will see some offers here (I only wants Sources and Clients so don’t come babbling about your server that’s running).
